Definitions
subSections.text:
{{zh-hanzi}}

# [[slave]]; [[servant]]
# {{lb|zh|polite}} [[I]]
# {{lb|zh|derogatory}} a person associated with a particular [[identity]] or [[trait]]
# to [[enslave]]
